name: TV to Movie Actors Trivia Game | Entertainment | 20 Questions

questions.correct: three men and a baby & 3 men and a baby
questions.explanation:
three men and a baby & 3 men and a baby.

	Stars Ted Danson, Tom Selleck, and Steve Guttenberg. Remake of the 1985 French movie 'Trois hommes et un couffin'.

questions.correct: Look Who's Talking & look whos talking
questions.explanation:
Look Who's Talking & look whos talking.

	Stars John Travolta, Kirstie Alley, and Bruce Willis as the voice of Mikey.

Toy Story.

	Stars Tom Hanks, Tim Allen, and Annie Potts as Bo Peep. It was the first fully computer-generated full-length feature film.

Death Becomes Her.

	Stars Goldie Hawn, Bruce Willis, and Meryl Streep.

Masters of the Universe.

	Stars Courteney Cox, Robert Duncan McNeill, and Christina Pickles.

questions.correct: Star Trek: The Motion Picture & star trek the motion picture
questions.explanation:
Star Trek: The Motion Picture & star trek the motion picture.

	Starring Leonard Nimoy, William Shatner, and Stephen Collins.

questions.correct: st elmos fire & saint elmos fire
questions.explanation:
st elmos fire & saint elmos fire.

	Stars Rob Lowe, Demi Moore, and Judd Nelson.

Doc Hollywood.

	Stars Michael J. Fox, Woody Harrelson, and David Ogden Stiers

Heroes.

	Stars Henry Winkler and Sally Field

Steel Magnolias.

	Stars Dylan McDermott, Tom Skerritt, and Janine Turner. Granted they're none of the six main characters, but they were in it.

questions.text: 'SCTV Network 90', 'As The World Turns', 'Star Trek: Voyager'
questions.explanation:
Innerspace & inner space.

	Stars Martin Short, Meg Ryan, and Robert Picardo.

The Shawshank Redemption.

	Stars Morgan Freeman, Gil Bellows, and William Sadler. More Trivia: Gil Bellows played Thomas 'Tommy' Williams in this {movie;} in 'Ally McBeal' he plays William 'Billy' Thomas.

The Birdcage.

	Stars Robin Williams, Calista Flockhart, and Hank Azaria.

questions.correct: Vacation & National Lampoon's Vacation & National Lampoons Vacation
questions.explanation:

Titanic.
